text.en:
Here I am,
dreaming once more
text.ga:
Anseo atá mé,
ag taidhbhreadh 
arís

text.en: I fell asleep among the stones
Long ago? How I wandered ever since
text.ga:
I bhfad ó shin?
mé im shiúl
ó shin

text.en:
Sparks! as from flint 
of a horses hoofs on the road

away with the faries!
 says Black Molly
